Ruth said, ["The name of the man [that I(Ruth) worked with today] is Boaz."]

I(Boaz) am telling you(man) these things in front of the people [that are sitting at this place] and these 10 leaders of our(Boaz's) town. [If you(man) want [to buy/redeem that land]] (imp) you(man) buy/redeem it.  These people (implicit-info) will see/witness [you(man) agreeing [to buy the land]]. Verse: I(Boaz) will also marry Ruth [who is from Moab]. Ruth was Mahlon's wife. I(Boaz) will do these things [in order to protect the dead man's name and the dead man's property]. [If Ruth gives birth to a son] that son (implicit-info) will be Elimelech's grandson. Therefore that man's relatives and the people [that live in that man's town] will not forget that man's name.  Today you(people) saw/witnessed [me(Boaz) doing these things]!"

Verse: Then those ten old men and all of the people [that were at the gate] said, ["We(people) saw/witnessed [you(Boaz) doing these things]].  We(people) pray [that Yahweh will cause [the woman [that you(Boaz) will marry] to become like Rachel and Leah]]. And we(people) pray [that Yahweh will cause [that woman to give birth to many children] [just like Rachel and Leah gave birth to the children [that became the Israelites]]]. And we(people) pray [that you(Boaz) will become powerful in Ephrathah].  And we(people) pray [that all of the people [who live in Bethlehem] will know about you(Boaz)].  (footnote) At that time people called Bethlehem Ephrathah.
